info.title: short API
info.description:
Domain-specific content summarization.
# Overview
Integrate in a snap with a **production-grade** content summarizer.

Powered by machine learning, **short** implements a model trained via [unsupervised learning using sentence embeddings](https://www.cs.utexas.edu/~asaran/reports/summarization.pdf) and tailored for particular use cases.
## Release Warning*
The following documentation and subsequent API is __subject to change__ as the service is currently in an `alpha` state.
## API Host
All requests are made to the following root URL with the `/api` prefix.

`https://short.oppie.io/api`
